thread.title: Madden NFL 16 Roster Update For Week 7 of the NFL Season Available Now
thread.title_full: Madden NFL 16 Roster Update For Week 7 of the NFL Season Available Now

author: Steve_OS
title: Madden NFL 16 Roster Update For Week 7 of the NFL Season Available Now
text: Madden NFL 16 Roster Update For Week 7 of the NFL Season Available Now 04:16 PM - October 22, 2015 by Steve_OS Week 7 of the NFL season is here and so are the updated Madden NFL 16 rosters. Check out the blog here , along with the sortable spreadsheet of all changes here. Tom Brady has joined the list of 99 overall rated players. Those players include Aaron Rodgers, J.J. Watt, Rob Gronkowski, Marshal Yanda and Von Miller. GOING UP Only OS members can post comments Please login or register to post a comment.
